name: CKEDITOR.dialog.definition
doc:
The definition of a dialog window.

This class is not really part of the API. It just illustrates the properties that developers can use to define and create dialogs.

// There is no constructor for this class, the user just has to define an
// object with the appropriate properties.

CKEDITOR.dialog.add( 'testOnly', function( editor ) {
    return {
        title:          'Test Dialog',
        resizable:      CKEDITOR.DIALOG_RESIZE_BOTH,
        minWidth:       500,
        minHeight:      400,
        contents: [
            {
                id:         'tab1',
                label:      'First Tab',
                title:      'First Tab Title',
                accessKey:  'Q',
                elements: [
                    {
                        type:           'text',
                        label:          'Test Text 1',
                        id:             'testText1',
                        'default':      'hello world!'
                    }
                ]
            }
        ]
    };
} );

members.name: buttons
members.doc: The buttons in the dialog, defined as an array of CKEDITOR.dialog.definition.button objects.
members.short_doc:
The buttons in the dialog, defined as an array of
CKEDITOR.dialog.definition.button objects. ...

members.name: contents
members.doc: The contents in the dialog, defined as an array of CKEDITOR.dialog.definition.content objects. Required.
members.short_doc:
The contents in the dialog, defined as an array of
CKEDITOR.dialog.definition.content objects. ...

members.name: height
members.doc: The initial height of the dialog, in pixels.
members.short_doc: The initial height of the dialog, in pixels. ...

members.name: minHeight
members.doc: The minimum height of the dialog, in pixels.
members.short_doc: The minimum height of the dialog, in pixels. ...

members.name: minWidth
members.doc: The minimum width of the dialog, in pixels.
members.short_doc: The minimum width of the dialog, in pixels. ...

members.name: onCancel
members.doc: The function to execute when Cancel is pressed.

members.name: onLoad
members.doc: The function to execute when the dialog is displayed for the first time.

members.name: onOk
members.doc: The function to execute when OK is pressed.

members.name: onShow
members.doc: The function to execute when the dialog is loaded (executed every time the dialog is opened).

members.name: resizable
members.doc:
How the dialog can be resized, must be one of the four contents defined below.

  • CKEDITOR.DIALOG_RESIZE_NONE
  • CKEDITOR.DIALOG_RESIZE_WIDTH
  • CKEDITOR.DIALOG_RESIZE_HEIGHT
  • CKEDITOR.DIALOG_RESIZE_BOTH
members.short_doc: How the dialog can be resized, must be one of the four contents defined below. ...

members.name: title
members.doc: The dialog title, displayed in the dialog's header. Required.
members.short_doc: The dialog title, displayed in the dialog's header. ...

members.name: width
members.doc: The initial width of the dialog, in pixels.
members.short_doc: The initial width of the dialog, in pixels. ...

short_doc: The definition of a dialog window. ...
